Title: Relates to a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York for the fiscal year commencing July 1, 2024.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to a rebate against real property taxes for certain owners of real property in the city of New York
